answers.answer: The dried yellow is normal. The fishy odor may not be.
Another question.. What do they test for in your urine every visit? Is it something that could cause the fishy smell.

The main thing they are looking for in your urine every visit is protein, luekocytes, blood, etc. Mostly to make sure you dont have any infections like a UTI or signs of preeclampsia etc. A fishy odor could be many things, and sometimes nothing. Could be a yeast infection, bacterial vaginosis, etc but your doctor will need to swab you to test for those things. Id just let ur doc know that u notice a different smell to ur discharge and would like to be checked.
Thank you, I should stop being embarrassed and say something tomorrow about it lol

No problem! :) and yes definitely dont be afraid to bring it up. I use to be the same way until I realized that they deal with this stuff everyday and are VERY use to it. All of us deal with these feminine issues while pregnant. Take care. :)

Hello I had the same problem last week I had a odor and yellowish discharge and when I went for a check up on Friday my doctor examine me down there and said I'm getting a yeast infection and that there gonna check for uti or blatter infection... hope everything goes good
Really I have no other symptoms though like no itchy or anything so I hope that's not the case but that definitely makes me want to mention it in case
I had a yeast infection early in my pregnancy and I had no symptoms at all not even discharge or smell or any itching. Hope all is well :)
How did they know you had one then? Do they test for that in urine?I was so embarrassed to ask my doctor today lol. Idk why

question: okay so is it normal to have your discharge dry up in your undies to a yellowish color? Also it kinda smells fishy sometimes.. But not all the time. I have my doctors appointment tomorrow and I have a feeling he will just say it's normal but I thought I'd ask for your opinions first.
title: Kind of TMI
